Class MenuUtility

com.deco2800.game.utils.MenuUtility
public class MenuUtility
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Summary

    static void addButtonRolloverListener​(TextButton button)
    Adds a listener to a button that triggers an event when the user activates the button rollover state

  • Method Details

    • addButtonSelectListener

      public static void addButtonSelectListener​(Entity entity, Button button, java.lang.String eventTrigger)
      Adds a listener to a button that triggers an event when the user selects the button
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity that the trigger will be called to
      button - the button to add the select listener to
      eventTrigger - the event to be triggered when button is selected

    • addButtonSelectListener

      public static void addButtonSelectListener​(Entity entity, Button button, java.lang.String eventTrigger, java.lang.String argument, Items itemType)
      Adds a listener to a button that triggers an event and passes a specific argument when the user selects the button. This listener is used specifically for shop popup box to distinguish between different buttons
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity that the trigger will be called to
      button - the button to add the select listener to
      eventTrigger - the event to be triggered when button is selected
      argument - that will be used to pass to the relevant method that will be triggered

    • addButtonRolloverListener

      public static void addButtonRolloverListener​(TextButton button)
      Adds a listener to a button that triggers an event when the user activates the button rollover state
      Parameters:
      button - the button to add the rollover listener to

    • changeMenuButtonStyles

      public static void changeMenuButtonStyles​(Table table, Skin skin, java.lang.String style, float buttonPad, float cellPad)
      Sets the style for all the buttons within the menu's table
      Parameters:
      table - - the table of menu buttons to alter
      skin - - the default skin config file
      style - - The LibGDX style to set the button to
      buttonPad - - The padding for each button of the table
      cellPad - - The padding for each cell of the table
